description: This file contains mock class definitions for testing components related to PlayerInfo, Dolby output, Audio/Video codec iterators, Player properties, and remote connections within the WPEFramework environment. It utilizes Google Mock for creating mock implementations used in unit testing.

classes.name: MockDolbyOutput
classes.description: Mock implementation of the WPEFramework::Exchange::Dolby::IOutput interface for testing Dolby output functionalities.

classes.name: MockAudioCodecIterator
classes.description: Mock implementation of the Exchange::IPlayerProperties::IAudioCodecIterator interface for testing audio codec iteration.

classes.name: MockVideoCodecIterator
classes.description: Mock implementation of the Exchange::IPlayerProperties::IVideoCodecIterator interface for testing video codec iteration.

classes.name: MockPlayerProperties
classes.description: Mock implementation of the WPEFramework::Exchange::IPlayerProperties interface for testing player properties.

classes.name: MockRemoteConnection
classes.description: Mock implementation of the RPC::IRemoteConnection interface for testing remote connection management.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Simulates incrementing reference count for the mock object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Simulates decrementing reference count for the mock object.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Simulates querying for a specific interface from the mock object.
